definition[0]: a difference between things, especially between the wages of people doing different types of jobs in the same industry or profession
definition[2]: based on or depending on a difference
example[1]: differential treatment of part-time and full-time staff
definition[3]: the amount of difference that there is between two things
example[2]: There is a severe differential in the quality of jobs between the north and south of the country.
definition[4]: based on or depending on a difference between two things
example[3]: The change in the exchange rate over a period will equal the differential inflation rates between the two countries.
